chart.title: Coverage of underlying data on the prevalence of mental illnesses
chart.subtitle: Share of the population for which there has been research on the prevalence of mental illnesses. This is defined as having prevalence data collected on each adult age group and gender, as a share of the total adult population of the region.
chart.note: Data came from diagnoses and surveys corresponding to the official DSM or ICD diagnostic criteria.

Major depression.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
Major depression.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Major depression” [dataset]. Baxter et al. (2013) [original data].
